sqlMap.statement: select * FROM( SELECT @NO := @NO + 1 AS ROWNO, DOMAINNM , DOMAINTYPE, DOMAINOPTION, DOMAINVAL FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM23 , (SELECT @NO := 0) R WHERE UPPER(DOMAINNM) LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #searchDomainNM# , '%' ) ) CONTENT WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum# ORDER BY 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM23 WHERE UPPER(DOMAINNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #searchDomainNM# , '%')
